name: Development Cycle Meta-Router V1

stages.name: Request Classification
stages.description: Classify user request as bug fix, feature request, refactor, or question

decisions.description: Request is a simple code modification

stages.name: Bug Fix Pipeline
stages.description: Execute bug-fix-v1 pipeline for bug fixes

stages.name: Quick Code Change
stages.description: Handle simple, direct code modifications (1-5 lines)

stages.name: Feature Development Pipeline
stages.description: Execute feature-development-v1 pipeline for new features

stages.name: Handle Question
stages.description: Answer user questions about code or system

connections.description: Bug detected, route to bug-fix pipeline
Simple change requested, use direct code implementer
Feature requested, route to feature-development pipeline
Bug fix pipeline complete - PIPELINE ENDS
Feature development pipeline complete - PIPELINE ENDS

userContext:
Bug: Ship fitted items are not persisting when the game is closed and reopened. When I fit items to my ship (like Mining Laser I or Afterburner) and then close Chrome completely and reopen the game, all my fitted items are gone.

The test should:
1. Dock at a station
2. Add test items to inventory (Mining Laser I, Afterburner)
3. Fit the items to ship slots
4. Trigger a save (manual save or wait for autosave)
5. Verify the items are fitted and the save file contains them
6. Print a message like 'Items fitted and saved. Now close Chrome completely, reopen the game client, and verify items are still fitted.'

The test does NOT need to automate the close/reopen - that's a manual verification step. The bug reproduction just needs to set up the scenario and save it.

Then implement a fix to ensure fitted items are properly restored when the game loads from a save file.

results.classify_request:
```json
{
  "classification": "BUG_FIX",
  "confidence": 0.98,
  "reasoning": "This is clearly a bug report. The user explicitly states 'Bug:' and describes a specific broken behavior: ship fitted items are not persisting across game sessions. The items disappear when the game is closed and reopened, which is unintended behavior that breaks core gameplay functionality.",
  "context": {
    "originalRequest": "Bug: Ship fitted items are not persisting when the game is closed and reopened. When I fit items to my ship (like Mining Laser I or Afterburner) and then close Chrome completely and reopen the game, all my fitted items are gone.",
    "keyIndicators": ["Bug:", "not persisting", "are gone", "broken behavior"],
    "affectedArea": "Ship fitting system, save/load system, localStorage persistence",
    "priority": "high",
    "additionalRequirements": [
      "Create test to reproduce the bug",
      "Test should fit items and trigger save",
      "Test should verify save contains fitted items",
      "Manual verification step: close/reopen browser",
      "Implement fix for proper persistence"
    ]
  }
}
```

DECISION: BUG_FIX
